def_cn: 共同市场(成员国之间根据协议开展自由贸易，制定共同遵循的工农业政策)
def_en: A common market is an organization of countries who have agreed to trade freely with each other and make common decisions about industry and agriculture.

def_cn: 欧洲共同市场(欧盟的旧称，现仍为部分人沿用)
def_en: The Common Market is the former name of the European Union. Some people still refer to the European Union as the Common Market .
